description:
A light and reliable way to keep the water out of your play boat. This Splash deck is designed to fit a variety of cockpit sizes found on recreational kayaks.

  • Waterproof coated nylon
  • Drawcord adjustable tunnel
  • Webbing grab loop makes it easy to get out when you need to
  • Durable and grippy bungee rand secures the skirt to the boat
  • Cockpit fit range – L: 76-91 x 43-58cm, XL: 78-94 x 46-58cm, XXL: 81-98 x 48-59cm, XXXL: 84-99 x 48-59cm
name: Level Six Splash Deck Spray Skirt - Unisex
